title: Crit chance this patch is too goddamn high

replies.body: Rito went too far with the crit buffs.

> [{quoted}](name=Beatrice falls,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=fPlO5EEE,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-08-01T19:20:55.469+0000)
>
> That's called the "Maximum overdraven effect"
> 
> https://media.discordapp.net/attachments/455110895551381504/463850664053702657/unknown.png

That's called urf. With a fed champion meant to snowball, with a damage oriented build, in a game mode centered around craziness and 1 shots.
Shhhh its okay if he doesn't tell the whole story in order to spread misinformation xddd
This is called memes and games.
Love how his passive did damage XD. Gotta love the death recap /s

Yes i totally want another unresponsive process for 5 minutes because I didn't lose enough time already in the middle of a ranked game.
And I don't mind getting leaverbustered for 100 minutes on top.

Once my laptop died in the middle of the game (no idea it wasnt plugged in)
So I had to restart and launch the game (my laptop is old so it took about 10 mins) 
As soon as i reconnected the game kicked me for being afk
I was like lul? Ok. 
I re-reconnected. 
Still lost LP 
Gj rito 10/10
We dont speak of the 100 minute leaver buster. For technical errors.
Volvo plx remove rando critz unkle Dan sed so.
